transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Haanji sir.

Executive: Good evening, Shivam aapke baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.

Customer: Haanji sir.

Executive: Haan mam, aapne baat, baat ki aapne Shivam hote?

Customer: Haan, sir, maine aapko bataya gaya hai, unhone apna wo band kar diya, mere ko is bare mein koi knowledge nahi hai. To jab bhi aapki aapko batayenge ki jab unhone koi karna hi nahi hai sath.

Executive: Hello. Nahi mam, wo nahi keh raha hu. Unki yaha par na company chal rahi hai, ki yaha par na service chalegi mam.

Executive: Thik hai? Unhone package liya tha teen saal ka, thik hai? To usme jo wo last service use kar rahe hai, to lead generate kar rahe hai, uske liye call kiya hai maine.

Customer: Abhi wo kyun nahi kar rahe, ye isko is bare mein mere ko nahi pata. Sorry yaha pe office mein bahut kam hote hai. Isliye mere ko abhi nahi pata. Jab bhi jis tarah hote hai, to main aapko baat kara dungi.

Executive: Mam, bas aise to maine pehle bhi call kiya tha, tab bhi baat...
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says account is closed, no knowledge.

- Executive says company running, service will run.

- Executive says package of 3 years taken.



Resolution:

- Executive called for lead generation.

- Customer says will connect when available.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, service
